services.name: Nutritional Information Service
services.description: This service provides detailed nutritional data for various food products, supporting diet planning and health management with API-enabled features.

services.name: Consumer Feedback Collection Service
services.description: Designed to collect, store, and analyze customer feedback on household and personal products, enhancing product improvement initiatives.

services.name: Sustainability Assessment Service
services.description: Allows manufacturers to assess and monitor the sustainability metrics of their product supply chain within the consumer staples domain.

services.name: Retail Inventory Optimization Service
services.description: Enables retailers to optimize inventory levels by analyzing purchase and restock patterns, improving efficiency and reducing waste.

services.name: E-Commerce Integration Service
services.description: Supports distributors and retailers by offering seamless integration of consumer staple products into e-commerce platforms, enhancing digital presence.
